title: Rogue Galaxy USA UNDUB 1.1
description:
Rogue Galaxy USA UNDUB 1.1 (c) LEVEL 5
                 hacked by somebody special

                     -- Information --

  Origin:   USA+Japan                DVD(S):   1xDVD5
  Released: March 8th, 2007          Format:   ISO
  Platform: Playstation 2 (PS2)      Files:    62 * 50MB 


                    -- Description --

  Here&#039;s a treat for those of you who love Japanese RPGs but can&#039;t
  stand the increasingly bad english voice jobs!  This UNDUB has
  the USA english text with the original Japanese spoken dialog. 

  Now includes the complete set of voices from the Director&#039;s Cut
  version released in Japan.

  Enjoy this game the way it was meant to be played!


                    -- Release Notes --

  Well, I&#039;ve been sitting on this for a year but never felt like
  testing it much since I hate the game now.  I&#039;m out of storage
  and need to do some spring cleaning though, so time to get rid
  of it.  Since people keep bugging me about the director&#039;s cut
  voices, you can all be testers instead of me ;).

  Event, battle, movie and field chatter are Japanese.  I believe
  there may be minor inconsistencies between the JP voices and the
  english script.  I don&#039;t think there&#039;s a very good way to deal
  with that, but if you run into major problems post a save game
  somewhere and I may take a look.

  As before, this is a typical DVD5 conversion with duplicate data
  eliminated and the credits movie killed.  All other movies are
  the RG DC originals.

  Hackers/coders want to contact me?  Look for a fluffy kitty.


                    *** USA PUBLISHERS ***

  Please stop ruining your games with such horrible english dubs!
  We are forced to go to extremes like this because you are making
  the games we love unplayable!

  Consider multi-language or special-edition releases with the
  original high quality Japanese voices.
